meta.importance: Filtering false breakouts prevents majority of losing trades
meta.key_stat: 70% of breakouts fail without proper confirmation

range_breakout.description: Price breaks out of consolidation range

success_with_volume.characteristics: Strong momentum, decisive break, volume surge

success_without_volume.note: High failure rate - AVOID trading these

consolidation_breakout.characteristics: Decreasing range, tightening bollinger bands, low ATR

first_attempt.note: Often fails first time - be cautious

second_attempt.note: Second test more likely to break

support_resistance_breakout.multiple_tests: Each failed breakout weakens the level

asian_range_breakout.description: Break of entire Asia session range

close_beyond_level.requirement: Candle must close beyond level, not just wick

retest_hold.description: Price breaks, pulls back to test level, holds and continues
retest_hold.entry: Best entry is on successful retest

momentum_confirmation.indicators: Strong candle, stochastic confirming, RSI > 50 (bullish) or < 50 (bearish)

time_confirmation.description: Wait 2-3 candles after break to confirm

low_volume.note: Single best filter for false breaks

wick_only.description: Price spikes through level but closes back inside

exhaustion_signs.description: Break occurs after extended move without pullback
exhaustion_signs.indicators: RSI >70 or <30, stochastic extreme, decreasing momentum

against_major_trend.description: Breakout opposite to higher timeframe trend

round_number_resistance.description: Breakout attempts at major round numbers

retest_entry.description: Wait for pullback to broken level
retest_entry.entry: Price pulls back to level, shows support/resistance flip, continue

two_stage_entry.description: Partial position on break, add on retest

failed_breakout_strategy.description: How to profit from false breakouts
failed_breakout_strategy.entry: When price clearly rejects and closes back inside
failed_breakout_strategy.stop: New high/low beyond the false break
failed_breakout_strategy.target: Opposite side of range or previous swing
failed_breakout_strategy.note: Fading false breaks is very profitable

clean_break.description: Decisive break with strong candle and volume

grinding_break.description: Multiple attempts, slowly grinds through level

spike_break.note: Wait for retest - often too fast

asia.note: Low volume, false breaks common - AVOID

london.note: Good for range breakouts, strong follow-through

ny_open.note: Best session for breakouts, high volume

equal_move.description: Expect move equal to range height

2x_move.description: Extreme move in very strong trends

risk_management.position_sizing: Reduce size on first attempt breakouts
risk_management.time_stop: Exit if no follow-through within 3-5 candles

key_principles.volume_is_king: Never trade breakout without volume confirmation
key_principles.retest_is_safest: Best entry is on successful retest
